derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French couguar, abbreviation of modern Latin cuguarcarana, from Guarani guaçuarana

entry.def: A cougar is a wild member of the cat family. Cougars have brownish-grey fur and live in mountain regions of North and South America.

means.word_mean: 1. large American feline resembling a lion

auth_sentence.content: The cougar is territorial and survives at low population densities.
